name: Stellarion
summary:
Returning home from your interstellar travels, you stumble upon a mining station that presents the perfect opportunity to upgrade your outdated spaceship. Take on the role of a miner, harvest precious resources, and trade them for powerful upgrades.

Navigate asteroid fields, face increasingly challenging enemies, and master your spaceship’s controls in a vast, procedurally generated space environment. Customize your ship with four types of upgrades—cargo capacity, firepower, durability, and speed—each with multiple tiers to suit your playstyle.
